Name: akda
About the game: akda - is a simple physical puzzle. The goal of the player is to throw the ball into the basket, avoiding obstacles. - 30 levels - Pleasant music - Steam achievements Controls: R - Restart level, LMB and arrows - control Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
